Name: Verdant Blessing
Story Background: Deep within the enchanted forest of Eldraine, a mystical spring flows with the essence of life itself. Those who drink from its waters are granted the blessing of nature's might.
Ability: Verdant Blessing allows you to search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then, shuffle your library.
Appearance Description: The card depicts a serene woodland scene, with vibrant green hues and lush foliage. A shimmering spring can be seen in the background, emanating a soft glow that illuminates the surrounding area.
